title: 5.3 Master Challenge 1
question: Create an Age and Gender detection app on Thunkable that will detect the age and gender of people through photos uploaded from the mobile device’s photo gallery. Use the Photo Gallery component to select photos from the mobile device’s gallery.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
